data.persona: I am a miner who works in a dangerous mine. I do not enjoy being dirty. I make sure to get paid fairly for anything I trade.
data.description:
You are in the Bazaar.
This place is made from wood. It has a huge window in the front and has many rows of items in it. It has no lights but due to the window is well lit.
There's a row and an a huge window in the front here.
The animal is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a boot and a Clothes.

data.short_motivation: I want to remove my boots so I can remove my clothes.
data.mid_motivation: I want to remove my clothes so I can put on the clean and new clothes I bought in the Bazaar.
data.long_motivation: I want to put on the clean clothes so i can travel to the castle and apply to become a clean castle guard, instead of a dirty miner.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: use Tub of Clean Water with Miner's Body
